entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
